entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected Build Cache Invalidation #38935

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.3xx] Enable parallel copy in PublishDotnetWatchToRedist #38929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update LocalizableStrings.zh-Hans.xlf #38918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix typo in VsMsdeploy.cs #38915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet list package] add an alias option, `-s`, to the option `--source`. #38911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert Parallel Copy for 8.0.200 #38931
  • Don't copy MSBuild to Container outputs #37315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #38882
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
